external.samtools¶

Script containing wrapper functions for samtools

Functions

depth(bam, records)

main(args)

run(cmd)

Run cmd via subprocess.

sort(sam, out[, nproc])

external.samtools.run(cmd)¶

Run cmd via subprocess.

Parameters

cmd (str) – Executable input str

Returns

True if retcode == 0. i.e. Success. False if retcode != 0. i.e. Failed.

Return type

bool

Raises

ExceptionName – Why the exception is raised.
